and 2. That there is no anus at all -
the intestine terminates in a rounded 
caecal extremity, which is straight and 
[text?] in <u>Waldheimia <\u> -  curved to 
the left side and enlarged in <u>Rhynchonella<\u>
I confess that this result, so exceptional 
is its character, caused me no small 
surprise and I have taken very great 
pains to satisfy myself of the accuracy 
of my conclusion - but notwithstanding the 
strong prejudice to the contrary to which 
the known relations of the anal aperture 
in Lingula gave rise - <s>I have <\s> repeated 
observation has invariably confirmed it 
Rhynchonella <s>[text?]<\s>
